io.spine.server.delivery

Class Inbox.Builder<I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.delivery.Inbox.Builder<I>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - the type of identifier of the objects, for which the Inbox is built
    Enclosing class:
    Inbox<I>

    public static final class Inbox.Builder<I>
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder of Inbox instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Inbox.Builder<I> addCommandEndpoint(io.spine.server.delivery.InboxLabel label, LazyEndpoint<I,CommandEnvelope> lazyEndpoint)
      Adds an endpoint for commands which will be delivered through the Inbox and marks it with the certain label.
      Inbox.Builder<I> addEventEndpoint(io.spine.server.delivery.InboxLabel label, LazyEndpoint<I,EventEnvelope> lazyEndpoint)
      Adds an endpoint for events which will be delivered through the Inbox and marks it with the certain label.
      Inbox<I> build()
      Creates an instance of Inbox and registers it in the server-wide Delivery.
      Inbox.Builder<I> withBatchListener(BatchDeliveryListener<I> dispatcher)
      Allows to specify the listener of the starting and ending batch dispatching operations.
